sentences.english: Overhead soared Crested Serpent-Eagles and a rainbow load of butterflies in the tree tops.
sentences.chinese: 一道由蝴蝶串成的彩虹就挂在树梢。

sentences.english: However, my father didn't come to us until the moon rise on the treetop.
sentences.chinese: 那晚，父亲一直到月亮都已经升上树梢了才回到家里。

sentences.english: Beyond the crows' treetops are banks of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 在乌鸦树梢的那一边是堆乌云。

sentences.english: Then I could fly across mountains and rivers to rest on a bough before your window.
sentences.chinese: 可以飞越万水千山，停在你窗前的树梢。

sentences.english: He threw me into the stream and rushed away over the tree-tops with a clap of thunder.
sentences.chinese: 他把我抛进河里后，霹雳的一声就从树梢上遁走了。

sentences.english: However, my father didn't come to us until the moon rise on the treetop .
sentences.chinese: 然而，月亮爬上树梢的时候，父亲才回来了。

sentences.english: From the green steeples of the piny wood;
sentences.chinese: 松树林子里，从那碧绿的树梢。

sentences.english: The sweetest grapes hang the highest. —F. E. Hulme.
sentences.chinese: 最甜美的葡萄挂在最高的树梢上。

sentences.english: Outside, the stars shone through the window above a jagged row of firs.
sentences.chinese: 屋外，星光从一排参差的冷杉树梢上透进窗子。

sentences.english: The sun was just rising through the leafy tops of those trees.
sentences.chinese: 太阳正从那些树的树梢上冉冉升起。

sentences.english: The fair crescent, white and bright, in calm fall at treetop suspend.
sentences.chinese: 一轮新月，皎洁地，挂在秋天没有风的树梢。

sentences.english: The Brachiosaurus was a plant eater. It ate tops of tall trees.
sentences.chinese: 腕龙是草食动物，它吃树梢处的叶子。

sentences.english: Mangy camelsrange, nuzzling the denuded tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 污秽的骆驼四处游荡，用鼻子蹭着裸露的树梢。

sentences.english: Where the treetops glisten and children listen to hear sleigh bells in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 树梢在雪中闪耀，孩童在雪天专心听雪橇铃声的到来。

sentences.english: Tonight, the moon came out, it was nearly full.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，似乎满月徐上树梢。

definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
Kaoshu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
